content: ChatGPT is likely going to sell ads soon. Why? Because AI chatbots keep users engaged without needing to click away. Expect a shift where free traffic stops unless you pay up. Think influencer marketing, but for AI. With only 4% of users paying, OpenAI wont miss that cash cow!

images.alt: Bar graph showing projected revenues for ChatGPT and other products from 2023 to 2029.
